recipesJson.name: Treat
recipesJson.author: Horsegame
recipesJson.description:
Here's a little treat for ya. For me, this isn't an ADV, I don't have a very big sweet tooth. But if you do, you will probably be sucking on this all day. It's wonderfully intense and nice for a change up. There's no hiding here, it tastes exactly like what you would imagine: A grape candy bubblegum lemonade, with peppermint.. lol. Enjoy!

* 2 drops of peppermint per 15mL
